message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable item. I believe it's worth discussing a price of $900000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I'm willing to make a serious investment in this product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $850000. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $750000 for the product. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers at $825000. This is my final compromise, and I hope we can reach an agreement.
